00034 void MseFillPolarX::Init()
00035 {
00036    fill                   =  0; 
00037    start_time             = mysqlpp::DateTime("0000-00-00 00:00:00");
00038    type                   =  0;
00039    beam_energy            =  0; 
00040    polar_blue_p0          =  0;
00041    polar_blue_decay       =  0;
00042    polar_yellow_p0        =  0;
00043    polar_yellow_p0_err    =  0;
00044    polar_yellow_decay     =  0;
00045    polar_yellow_decay_err =  0;
00046    polar_blue_hjet        = -1; 
00047    polar_blue_hjet_err    = -1; 
00048    polar_yellow_hjet      = -1; 
00049    polar_yellow_hjet_err  = -1; 
00050    polar_blue_1           = -1; 
00051    polar_blue_1_err       = -1;

00070 void MseFillPolarX::PrintAsPhp(FILE *f) const
00071 {
00072    fprintf(f, "$rc['fill']                    = %d;\n", fill              );
00073    fprintf(f, "$rc['type']                    = %d;\n", type              );
00074    fprintf(f, "$rc['beam_energy']             = %f;\n", beam_energy       );
00075    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_blue_hjet']         = %f;\n", polar_blue_hjet        );
00076    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_blue_hjet_err']     = %f;\n", polar_blue_hjet_err    );
00077    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_yellow_hjet']       = %f;\n", polar_yellow_hjet      );
00078    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_yellow_hjet_err']   = %f;\n", polar_yellow_hjet_err  );
00079    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_blue_1']            = %f;\n", polar_blue_1      );
00080    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_blue_1_err']        = %f;\n", polar_blue_1_err  );
00081    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_blue_2']            = %f;\n", polar_blue_2      );
00082    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_blue_2_err']        = %f;\n", polar_blue_2_err  );
00083    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_yellow_1']          = %f;\n", polar_yellow_1    );
00084    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_yellow_1_err']      = %f;\n", polar_yellow_1_err);
00085    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_yellow_2']          = %f;\n", polar_yellow_2    );
00086    fprintf(f, "$rc['polar_yellow_2_err']      = %f;\n", polar_yellow_2_err);
00087    fprintf(f, "\n");
00088 }

00092 void MseFillPolarX::SetValues(const AnaFillResult &afr)
00093 {
00094    start_time  = mysqlpp::DateTime(afr.GetStartTime());
00095    type        = afr.GetFillType();
00096    beam_energy = afr.GetFlattopEnergy();
00097 
00098    if (afr.fHJPolars.find(kBLUE_RING) != afr.fHJPolars.end() ) {
00099       polar_blue_hjet     = afr.GetHJPolar(kBLUE_RING).first; 
00100       polar_blue_hjet_err = afr.GetHJPolar(kBLUE_RING).second; 
00101    }
00102 
00103    if (afr.fHJPolars.find(kYELLOW_RING) != afr.fHJPolars.end() ) {
00104       polar_yellow_hjet     = afr.GetHJPolar(kYELLOW_RING).first; 
00105       polar_yellow_hjet_err = afr.GetHJPolar(kYELLOW_RING).second; 
00106    }
00107 
00108    ValErrPair ve;
00109 
00110    ve = afr.GetBeamPolarP0(kBLUE_RING);
00111    polar_blue_p0     = utils::PackDecimal(ve);
00112    //polar_blue_p0_err = ve.second;
00113 
00114    ve = afr.GetBeamPolarDecay(kBLUE_RING);
00115    polar_blue_decay     = ve.first;
00116    //polar_blue_decay_err = ve.second;
00117 
00118    ve = afr.GetBeamPolarP0(kYELLOW_RING);
00119    polar_yellow_p0     = ve.first;
00120    polar_yellow_p0_err = ve.second;
00121 
00122    ve = afr.GetBeamPolarDecay(kYELLOW_RING);
00123    polar_yellow_decay     = ve.first;
00124    polar_yellow_decay_err = ve.second;
00125 
00126    if (afr.fPCPolars.find(kB1U) != afr.fPCPolars.end() ) {
00127       polar_blue_1       = afr.GetPCPolar(kB1U).first; 
00128       polar_blue_1_err   = afr.GetPCPolar(kB1U).second; 
00129    }
00130 
00131    if (afr.fPCPolars.find(kY1D) != afr.fPCPolars.end() ) {
00132       polar_yellow_1     = afr.GetPCPolar(kY1D).first; 
00133       polar_yellow_1_err = afr.GetPCPolar(kY1D).second; 
00134    }
00135 
00136    if (afr.fPCPolars.find(kB2D) != afr.fPCPolars.end() ) {
00137       polar_blue_2       = afr.GetPCPolar(kB2D).first; 
00138       polar_blue_2_err   = afr.GetPCPolar(kB2D).second; 
00139    }
00140 
00141    if (afr.fPCPolars.find(kY2U) != afr.fPCPolars.end() ) {
00142       polar_yellow_2     = afr.GetPCPolar(kY2U).first; 
00143       polar_yellow_2_err = afr.GetPCPolar(kY2U).second; 
00144    }
00145 
00146 }
